name: Uncanny Suction
summary: Your limbs produce strange, sucker-like growths that allow you to adhere to walls, objects, and most other surfaces.
description:
Your limbs produce strange, sucker-like growths that allow you to adhere to walls, objects, and most other surfaces. You gain a climb Speed equal to your half your land Speed (minimum 5 feet). If you have the Quick Climber feat, your climb Speed is equal to your land Speed. In addition, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Reflex DC to avoid being Disarmed.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
